full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSHIN PO'I DUR 'DEBS KYIS BLANG BA SOGS JI LTAR BYA TSUL GYI CHO GA DOR BSDUS GZHAN PHAN SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RIG 'DZIN DPAL MGON BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I MING CAN GYIS, MTSAN LDAN DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS BYUNG BA LTAR BRIS PA LA LHA SHES ZHES SU GRAGS PA'I RTZIS MKHAN DANG MKHAS PA RNAMS DPYOD CAN GZU BOR GNAS RNAMS KYI GZIGS NA THUGS KYIS MI KHRIL ZHU'O, ,YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
